transcription.text:
View Master Viewing Reels from Sawyer's, Inc.
FT-2 Hansel and gretel.
Originally Part 7 of P179116, individual record made for location tracking/ XOS purposes while on display (BUT it is on display in MI-08-C01 with the other reels from P179116? fmm 1/4/21)

work.title: Sawyer's View Master Viewing Reel - FT 2 Hansel and Gretel
